long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly look up the Liberty Score of a US Congressman by highlighting and right-clicking the name of the lawmaker and then select "View Liberty Score".

***The developer does not own the rights to the website and this extension is simply being offered as a free public service.***
